item.title: DIY RO - Water Purification
item.description: Intro The water hardness in my home (gobi) is around ~600ppm. In chennai where I live.. its around 800ppm (metro water), half get purificed water for their drinking, there is businees for these people who supply water for people, the other half get the water purficiation system in their home by a vendor/ company that produces it. We can build a DIY homemade purifier. Its a new challenge/ learning new things and cheaper than buying readymade.
